translations.translation: The {field} field cannot exceed {param} characters in length.

translations.translation: The {field} field must be at least {param} characters in length.

translations.label: frequency_exp
translations.translation: This value indicates how frequently the content at a particular URL is likely to change

translations.label: google_news_cache_exp
translations.translation: This system uses cache system. So the records in your XML file will be automatically updated every 15 minutes.

translations.label: google_news_exp
translations.translation: According to Google News rules, there can be a maximum of 1000 publications in an XML file. Therefore, it is not recommended to increase this limit.

translations.label: help_documents_exp

translations.label: msg_reset_cache
translations.translation: All cache files have been deleted!

translations.label: msg_rss_warning
translations.translation: If you chose to download the images to your server, adding posts will take more time and will use more resources. If you see any problems, increase 'max_execution_time' and 'memory_limit' values from your server settings.

translations.label: msg_send_confirmation_email
translations.translation: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address for activation. Please confirm your account.

translations.label: msg_slug_used

translations.label: msg_unsubscribe
translations.translation: You will no longer receive emails from us!

translations.label: msg_username_unique_error
translations.translation: The username has already been taken.

translations.label: navigation_exp
translations.translation: You can manage the navigation by dragging and dropping menu items.

translations.label: nav_drag_warning
translations.translation: You cannot drag a category below a page or a page below a category link!

translations.label: newsletter_desc

translations.label: newsletter_email_error
translations.translation: Select email addresses that you want to send mail!

translations.label: newsletter_send_many_exp
translations.translation: Some servers do not allow mass mailing. Therefore, instead of sending your mails to all subscribers at once, you can send them part by part (Example: 50 subscribers at once). If your mail server stops sending mail, the sending process will also stop.

translations.label: number_of_correct_answers_range
translations.translation: The range of correct answers to show this result

translations.label: number_of_days_exp
translations.translation: If you add 30 here, the system will delete posts older than 30 days

translations.label: number_of_links_in_menu

translations.label: page_not_found_sub
